document.full_text: more than a year after they announced their reunion, the members of seattle rock band soundgarden said on thursday they would tour north america for the first time in almost 15 years during the summer.
document.title: soundgarden sets summer reunion tour of north america
lines_and_colors: more than a year after they announced their reunion, the members of seattle rock band soundgarden said on thursday they would tour north america for the first time in almost 15 years during the summer.
